title: 28 - David Cross
itunes:title: 28 - David Cross
description: Does this man even need an introduction? It’s David Cross! And if you don’t know him from Mr. Show, Arrested Development, Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt, his many hilarious stand-up comedy albums and specials, and much more, you’re gonna get to know him now. We’re talking everything from having both kids and dogs to touring in the South to one of the weirdest show he’s ever done. Here are five words to describe this episode: don’t shout, “Free Bird,” hack!
content:encoded: Does this man even need an introduction? It’s David Cross! And if you don’t know him from Mr. Show, Arrested Development, Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt, his many hilarious stand-up comedy albums and specials, and much more, you’re gonna get to know him now. We’re talking everything from having both kids and dogs to touring in the South to one of the weirdest show he’s ever done. Here are five words to describe this episode: don’t shout, “Free Bird,” hack!
itunes:author: All Things Comedy
